title: Decision Boundary in Machine Learning
description: The general goal of a classification model is to find a decision boundary. The purpose of the decision boundaries is to identify those regions of the input class space that corresponds to each class. In this article, I will take you through the concept of decision boundary in machine learning.To explain the concept of decision boundaries in machine learning, I will first create a Logistic Regression model.
